tasks.label: Build js-solitaire (external)
tasks.command: bash -lc 'set -e; cd "$HOME/Downloads/js-solitaire-master"; echo "PWD=$(pwd)"; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json || true; npm uninstall node-sass || true; npm install -D sass autoprefixer || true; npm install; npm run build'

tasks.label: Import solitaire src and build
tasks.command:
bash -lc 'set -e
# Copy original source from Downloads into Vite project src
SRC_DIR="$HOME/Downloads/js-solitaire-master/src"
DEST_DIR="$PWD/games/solitaire-vite/src"
if [ -d "$SRC_DIR" ]; then
  rm -rf "$DEST_DIR"/*
  cp -R "$SRC_DIR"/* "$DEST_DIR"/
else
  echo "Source not found: $SRC_DIR" >&2
  exit 2
fi

# Ensure Vite entry exists and points to src/index.js
INDEX_HTML="$PWD/games/solitaire-vite/index.html"
if [ -f "$INDEX_HTML" ]; then
  # Replace script line to use /src/index.js
  perl -0777 -pe "s#<script[^>]*src=\"/src/[^\"]+\"[^>]*></script>#<script type=\"module\" src=\"/src/index.js\"></script>#g" "$INDEX_HTML" > "$INDEX_HTML.tmp" && mv "$INDEX_HTML.tmp" "$INDEX_HTML"
fi

cd "$PWD/games/solitaire-vite"
# Install deps if package-lock missing
[ -d node_modules ] || npm install
npm run build
'
